0.message: Number with more then 1 decimal point
0.suggestion: Consider removing all but one decimal point

1.suggestion: Consider adding a left parenthesis to the coresponding right parenthesis

2.suggestion: Consider adding a left brace to the coresponding right brace

3.suggestion: Consider adding a left bracket to the coresponding right bracket

4.suggestion: Consider adding a right parenthesis to the coresponding left parenthesis

5.suggestion: Consider adding a right brace to the coresponding left brace

6.suggestion: Consider adding a right bracket to the coresponding left bracket

7.suggestion: Consider changing the single quotes to double quotes

8.suggestion: Consider adding a ' to match the end of the character

9.suggestion: Consider adding a " to match the end of the stirng
